messages.content: Liked a message
Wonderful
Hope to see you soon in NY or Bali!
I will reach out to Tavish and look forward to working with you both!
Thank you so much Carina, itâs an amazing journey when you are truly passionate about something. I have so much inspiration from so many wonderful people I have met!
And yes to seeing you in America. No trip planned as of now though, but things do tend to creep up and move quickly
Of course I am flattered you'd like to include our work
I am delighted to hear about these new ventures, building something is hard and takes tremendous courage.
Gina, best to email Tavish about this - tavish@carinahardy.com

Hi love! Hope all is well!! I started an interior design company and have an online curated marketplace of very special pieces I have found throughout my travels. I have received so many compliments on my earrings every single time I wear them and was wondering if I would be able to include them for sale on my site? Please let me know your thoughts and if we can discuss furtherâ¦ I would love that. They are so special and would love to share them with others!  Hope all is well and let me know if you plan to visit NY soon! Kim and I are next door neighbors and maybe we can all meet up next time you visit! xx
Youâre welcome!
Liked a message
Reacted ð to your message
Amazing, thank you Gina! Looking forward to this
Sounds like a plan. Should be a easy laser weld, though it may leaf a little black mark when its attached. Keep me POST-ed ;)
Big hugs and kisses!! ðxx
The woman I will connect you with is Vera- she is traveling this week but will reach out when she returns back to cayman so you both can chat!
Hi Carina!! I brought the earrings to a local jeweler to see if he can fix them first, so Iâll keep you posted on the post ð
Let us know how to proceed on both fronts - sending big love from Bali!

We would absolutely love to be introduced to the boutique contact you mention, it is because wonderful women like you make these connections that we are able to expand our reach and bring our jewelry to more people across the globe, so thank you!

There are two ways to fix this issue - you can feel free to send them to me at the below address, provide me with your address, and we will fix them and send them back. The downside is wait time with this option.

Carina Hardy
2109 Broadway, Apt 4-77
New York, NY 10023

Alternatively, because this is a simple fix, you can ask any jewelry store that does repair to fix this, and they should be able to get it done in a few minutes.
Gina, of course! Thank you for letting me know about the post issue, I'm very sorry that happened!

Hi Carina! This is Gina, Iâm Kim Strotherâs friend and met you when we were just in Bali! It was so lovely to meet you! I am currently in Grand Cayman at a boutique resort called Palm Heights- where they have a boutique that features amazing and unique jewelry like yours. They may be interested in the elppin collection. Let me know your thoughts and I can connect you! Also, I purchased a pair of the hanging earrings and the post broke off. How do you recommend I fix it so I can wear them? Thank you!! ð
